summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganThe lightweight e.l.f. SKIN's Holy Hydration! Daily Hydrating Moisturizer is infused with skin-happy ingredients that deeply nourish and hydrate.
details: DetailsBenefitsLightweight, creamy formula hydrates skinEnriched with naturally nourishing vitamins & antioxidantsLocks in moisture for a smooth, healthy-looking complexionIdeal for daily useGreat for all skin types100% vegan & cruelty-freeKey IngredientsAloe vera soothes & provides anti-inflammatory benefitsJojoba oil locks in moistureShea butter nourishes skin for a smooth finishVitamin E softens skinGrapeseed oil evens out skin toneFormulated WithoutPhthalates, parabens, nonylphenol ethoxylates, triclosan, triclocarban & hydroquinoneItem 2500311How To UseUse daily in the morning after cleansing. Massage a small amount of formula into hands and gently pat all over the face and neck to absorb into the skin.How to Use e.l.f. Full Skincare Regimen:Step 1: Serum: Apply first to clean skin to soothe redness and irritation while illuminating the skin.Step 2: Daily Hydration Moisturizer: After Soothing Serum, apply before makeup to moisturize and lock in hydration for smooth, even skin.Step 3: Illuminating Eye Cream: After moisturizing, gently dab around the eye and brow area to brighten and lift tired eyes.Step 4: Nourishing Night Cream: Apply to clean face before bed after Soothing Serum and wake up with vibrant skin!IngredientsWater (Aqua), Butylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Steareth-21, Steareth-2, Stearic Acid, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Chrysanthellum Indicum Extract, Triethanolamine, Acrylates / C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Tocopheryl Acetate (Ve), Disodium EDTA, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugar Cane) Extract, Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit / Leaf Extract, Citrus Sinensis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Acer Saccharum (Sugar Maple) Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Fragrance (Parfum).
how_to_use: Use daily in the morning after cleansing. Massage a small amount of formula into hands and gently pat all over the face and neck to absorb into the skin.How to Use e.l.f. Full Skincare Regimen:Step 1: Serum: Apply first to clean skin to soothe redness and irritation while illuminating the skin.Step 2: Daily Hydration Moisturizer: After Soothing Serum, apply before makeup to moisturize and lock in hydration for smooth, even skin.Step 3: Illuminating Eye Cream: After moisturizing, gently dab around the eye and brow area to brighten and lift tired eyes.Step 4: Nourishing Night Cream: Apply to clean face before bed after Soothing Serum and wake up with vibrant skin!

reviews.headline: I like it!
reviews.comments: I suffer from dermatitis so I'm very cautious of what I use on my face. I've been using this product for about 2 weeks now and have not noticed any issues. It leaves my skin feeling moisturized and soft.

reviews.headline: The best
reviews.comments: I have repurchased this over and over. Absolutely love this- does not break me out. Keeps me from getting too oily and is great to mix with bronzing drops. The packagaing allows you ti get every last drop of product out of the tube too.

reviews.headline: Like a fresh bucket of water
reviews.comments: Holy Hydration, Indeed! ever since I found this moisturizer it has been one of my favorite products to use in my morning routine.

reviews.headline: GREAT MOISTURIZER!!!!
reviews.comments: This is a great moisturizer its great for sunburns it is thick but not too thick and is very affordable

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: This is definitely the best moisturizer I've ever used. After using once, I already saw the difference, it's hydrating, give soft skin, & helps with oily/greasy skin.

reviews.headline: Love it for the price!
reviews.comments: Great product, great price! It does exactly what it is supposed to do at a fraction of the price of the other competitors! Love elf

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again
reviews.comments: Great price for the amount and usefulness of this moisturizer. I was impressed with this product, the ease of use, and, the price. My skin responded well to the moisturizer and skin firming ingredients, similar to much higher priced products that I have tried.

reviews.headline: Elf?
reviews.comments: I LOVE elf so much but has anyone noticed that most if not all their holy hydration line has SO much fragrence especially in skincare when there really doesent need to be.

reviews.headline: No notes
reviews.comments: This is by far my favorite moisturizer to use before makeup. I have been consistently using it for 10+ years and although I try others now and then, I always come back. It doesn't pill under my makeup, it absorbs into the skin quickly and doesn't look greasy. I have combo skin and have found this to be the best choice for my skin. I use it as a daily moisturizer as well, not only under makeup.

reviews.headline: Pretty Good
reviews.comments: Initially, I really liked this moisturizer, but as I kept using it I felt as if it was too light-weight and too watery. However, it didn't inflame my skin, dry it out, or make me breakout as someone with oily skin.

reviews.headline: Really Like this Moisturizer
reviews.comments: This is a really nice moisturizer - I wasn't sure what to expect I have never ventured into ELF skin care but this will definitely be a repeat purchase. It is really lightweight and not greasy it is really comfortable and there is NO SMELL which is even better for me. I like unscented face products. I had no issues with breakouts or anything when using this product. Love that it is also reasonably priced.

reviews.headline: Awesome hydration
reviews.comments: If you have oily/combination skin you will love it! And the price just perfect. Im rebuying again.

reviews.headline: Good
reviews.comments: Amazing

reviews.headline: Buying my second bottle
reviews.comments: I picked it up one day and not expecting much from it but has become my staple face moisturizer. Reminds me of watercream because its thin but not watery, really hydrating and not heavy feeling. Great price packaging is practical and just all round daily driver. Definitely recommend.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: I have eczema and it help my dry spots and helps my eczema.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I use this every day and am obsessed. It is so hydrating and will make your skin GLOW. If you're trying to get that glass skin look, use this! It's not heavy, thick or watery. Doesn't have a bad or perfume smell. Very gentle on sensitive skin. And It wears so beautifully under makeup.

reviews.headline: Not suitable for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I really wanted to love this product due to the consistency of elf, however I have acne prone, dry, sensitive skin. This made my face burn, and red. I believe if you don't fall under these categories it would be great.

reviews.headline: Perfect affordable moisturizer!
reviews.comments: I love the holy hydration line because its effective and affordable.

reviews.headline: New favorite daily moisturizer!
reviews.comments: I have dry skin and love this as it absorbs quickly and js very moisturizing without being too heavy and just sitting in my face like other, more expensive moisturizers do.

reviews.headline: High moisture without the greasy feel
reviews.comments: Love this stuff! I've been trying to replace my high end/expensive products with vegan, cruelty free more inexpensive options. This stuff works amazing on my aging, rosacea skin. I put it on after my serum, and retinol and it has my skin glowy but still lightweight. No scent which is also important to me.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I cannot say enough good things about this product!! I have had horrible hormonal cystic acne for the past 8 months, and I have had such a hard time getting rid of it. I tried tons of expensive acne face washes and topical solutions, but nothing made a difference. The only things that have made a difference are this moisturizer and Cetaphil daily face wash... my acne is almost completely gone now!

A month ago I asked a close friend of mine to do my makeup for an event - she is very knowledgeable about skincare/good skincare products in general.  I brought all of my makeup products to her house and she asked, "where is your moisturizer?"  ...being the most clueless person about skincare ever, I told her I didn't use one. She was horrified to say the least! So she looked through her products and whipped out this e.l.f. moisturizer fresh out of the box.  She applied it with a brand new foundation brush, so it felt like I was getting a facial! It made my skin feel so good and it did not leave it feeling greasy at all. My skin absorbed it so quickly! My fear had always been that a moisturizer would make me break out even more and leave my skin feeling greasy. This moisturizer did exactly the opposite. The best part is the wonderful scent! It's such a fresh, clean smell. The packaging is really nice/high quality as well. I highly recommend this product!!
faceoff_positive.headline: A Miracle Product! Great for Acne-Prone Skin

faceoff_negative.comments: I bought elf daily hydration moisturizer two weeks ago... worst mistake ever!!!! I've been trying to figure out why my face has been breaking out and it is because of this greasy product !!! My face is read and has so many fine bumps... I'm livid!!!!!
faceoff_negative.headline: Never buy this product!!!!
